name: repoguardian-x
description: Local-first VS Code security extension with GitLab CI automation.

scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/test/masking.test.js && node dist/test/integration.test.js && node dist/test/e2e.test.js

repoguardian.scanOnSave.description: Run security scan automatically when saving files

repoguardian.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size to scan in bytes (default: 1MB). Files larger than this will be skipped.

repoguardian.ignorePaths.description: Additional paths to ignore during scanning (in addition to .safecommit-ignore). Examples: 'test/**', '*.fixture.js'

repoguardian.reportRetentionDays.description: Number of days to retain local scan reports before auto-deletion (default: 7)

repoguardian.showStatusBar.description: Show RepoGuardian status in the status bar
